title: SUPER MARIO Boys' T-Shirt
features: Generous fit. We recommend ordering a size down
A blue short sleeve top features a fun print of Mario from the legendary game series surrounded by stars in yellow and black and the slogan ''It's-a me, Mario!''
Mario kart fans will love this gaming t-shirt!
description: Boys Super Mario T-Shirt. It's-a me, Mario! Get your little gamer ready to discover adventures of Super Mario. This blue short sleeve top features a fun print of Mario from the legendary game series surrounded by stars in yellow and black and the slogan ''It's-a me, Mario!''. The perfect tee for your Mario fan to wear on trips to the Mushroom Kingdom!
